ticket.title: time_select can't edit back to blank value
ticket.original-body:
I'm really new to rails and i'm loving it. This is my first ticket so I'm sorry is this is not clear. Maybe this can be helpful!
I have a <%= f.time_select(:start_time, :minute_step => 30, :include_blank => true) %> which works, though if I select a time and then want to edit it back and remove it by setting in to blank, I get "00:00" instead of blank. I'm on rails 3.0.0 btw
